Class Maze

  • java.lang.Object
    • Maze

  • public class Maze
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Maze creates a Maze containing a hero of type Player, a wraith of type Monster, a door of type Door, a roomList a 2D Room Array of type Room. The maze also contains a Room currentRoom to point to the current Room in the roomList, and an integer mazeSize defaulted to a 4x4 room maze.
    Since:
    July 20, 2019

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Maze()
      Default constructor creates a hero,wraith,locked door, and a roomList of size mazeSize*mazeSize each with a Room with all walls on and no items.
      Maze(int size)
      Input constructor takes input size as the maze size, creates a hero,wraith,locked door, and a roomList of size size*size each with a Room with all walls on and no items.
      Maze(Maze toCopy)
      Copy constructor takes an input Maze toCopy and deep copies all members into the new Maze object.

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void copyHero(Player h)
      Mutator to point the hero object in the maze to a copy of another input Player object.
      void deleteHero()
      Mutator to kill the hero.
      void deleteMonster()
      Mutator to kill the monster and delete it from the maze, setting the Room boolean HasMonster to false.

      Method to have the hero attack the monster and the monster attack the hero in a Fight Turn.

      Accessor to get a copy of the Room in roomList that the Room pointer currentRoom is pointing too.

      Mutator to unlock the Door boolean in the Door object door.

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Maze

        public Maze()
        Default constructor creates a hero,wraith,locked door, and a roomList of size mazeSize*mazeSize each with a Room with all walls on and no items. Additionally the currentRoom is set to the Room at location (0,0) or roomList[0][0].

      • Maze

        public Maze(int size)
        Input constructor takes input size as the maze size, creates a hero,wraith,locked door, and a roomList of size size*size each with a Room with all walls on and no items. Additionally the currentRoom is set to the Room at location (0,0) or roomList[0][0].
        Parameters:
        size - An integer specifying the size of the 2D array of Rooms, roomList will be size*size elements in a 2D array.

      • Maze

        public Maze(Maze toCopy)
        Copy constructor takes an input Maze toCopy and deep copies all members into the new Maze object.
        Parameters:
        toCopy - a Maze object to copy.

    • Method Detail

      • getHero

        public Player getHero()
        Accessor to get a copy of the Player hero, returns a copy.
        Returns:
        a copy of the hero object of type Player by copy construction.

      • getMonster

        public Monster getMonster()
        Accessor to get a copy of the Monster wraith, returns a copy.
        Returns:
        a copy of the wraith object of type Monster by copy construction.

      • getDoor

        public Door getDoor()
        Accessor to get a copy of the Door object door, returns a copy.
        Returns:
        a copy of the door object of type Door by copy construction.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(Point p)
        Accessor to get a copy of a Room in roomList at a particular point (x,y) location given an input Point p, returns a copy.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point (x,y) location of type Point representing a Room in roomList at location (x,y)
        Returns:
        a copy of the Room object of located at Point p in the roomList by copy construction.

      • getRoom

        public Room getRoom(int x,
                    int y)
        Accessor to get a copy of a Room in roomList at a particular point (x,y) location given an input x and y in integer coordinate pair format, returns a copy.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate of the Room in roomList at point (x,y)
        y - An integer y-coordinate of the Room in roomList at point (x,y)
        Returns:
        a copy of the Room object of located at Point p in the roomList by copy construction.

      • getCurrentRoom

        public Room getCurrentRoom()
        Accessor to get a copy of the Room in roomList that the Room pointer currentRoom is pointing too. Returns a copy.
        Returns:
        a copy of the Room object in the roomList that currentRoom is pointing to using getRoom(). currentRoom should point to the location of the hero object.

      • getMazeSize

        public int getMazeSize()
        Accessor to get the integer size of the maze. returns mazeSize.
        Returns:
        the integer value of mazeSize the size of the maze.

      • setRoom

        public void setRoom(Point p,
                    boolean left,
                    boolean right,
                    boolean up,
                    boolean down,
                    boolean key,
                    boolean door,
                    boolean map,
                    boolean monster)
        Mutator to set the walls and key items in a room.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point location of the room to set up.
        left - The value of the leftWall boolean in a Room.
        right - The value of the rightWall boolean in a Room.
        up - The value of the topWall boolean in a Room.
        down - The value of the bottomWall boolean in a Room.
        key - The value of the hasKey Key item boolean in a Room.
        map - The value of the hasMap Map item boolean in a Room.
        monster - The value of the hasMonster Monster object boolean in a Room.

        Parameters:

        map - The value of the hasMap Map item boolean in a Room.

        Mutator to set the room the currentRoom points to using Point p as location input.

      • setCurrentRoom

        public void setCurrentRoom(int x,
                           int y)
        Mutator to set the room the currentRoom points to using (x,y) integer inputs as location inputs.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.
        y - An integer y-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.

      • setRoomPlayer

        public void setRoomPlayer(int x,
                          int y,
                          boolean inRoom)
        Mutator to set the Room at location (x,y) to have the hasPlayer room switched to value inRoom. Set inRoom to true to put the player in the Room, false to remove player from Room.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.
        y - An integer y-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.
        inRoom - A boolean to indicate the presence of the hero in the room, true to place player in room, false to remove hero from room.

      • setRoomPlayer

        public void setRoomPlayer(Point p,
                          boolean inRoom)
        Mutator to set the Room at location Point p to have the hasPlayer Room boolean switched to value inRoom. Set inRoom to true to put the player in the Room, false to remove player from Room.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point location of the room to modify.
        inRoom - A boolean to indicate the presence of the hero in the room, true to place player in room, false to remove hero from room.

      • setRoomMonster

        public void setRoomMonster(int x,
                           int y,
                           boolean inRoom)
        Mutator to set the Room at location (x,y) to have the hasMonster Room boolean switched to value inRoom. Set inRoom to true to put the wraith Monster in the Room, false to remove the wraith Monster from Room.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.
        y - An integer y-coordinate location of the Room to point currentRoom at.
        inRoom - A boolean to indicate the presence of the wraith Monster in the room, true to place the wraith Monster in room, false to remove the wraith from room.

      • setRoomMonster

        public void setRoomMonster(Point p,
                           boolean inRoom)
        Mutator to set the Room at location Point p to have the hasMonster room boolean switched to value inRoom. Set inRoom to true to put the wraith Monster in the Room, false to remove the wraith Monster from Room.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point location of the room to modify.
        inRoom - A boolean to indicate the presence of the wraith Monster in the room, true to place wraith Monster in room, false to remove the wraith Monster from room.

      • setRoomItems

        public void setRoomItems(int x,
                         int y,
                         boolean key,
                         boolean door,
                         boolean map,
                         boolean monster,
                         boolean food)
        Mutator to set the room items Key,Door,Map,Monster,Food at an (x,y) room location in roomList.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate location of the Room in roomList to set.
        y - An integer y-coordinate location of the Room in roomList to set.
        key - A boolean representing the state of the hasKey Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        door - A boolean representing the state of the hasDoor Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        map - A boolean representing the state of the hasMap Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        monster - A boolean representing the state of the hasMonster Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        food - A boolean representing the state of the hasFood Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)

      • setRoomItems

        public void setRoomItems(Point p,
                         boolean key,
                         boolean door,
                         boolean map,
                         boolean monster,
                         boolean food)
        Mutator to set the room items Key,Door,Map,Monster,Food at a a Point p representing a room location in roomList.
        Parameters:
        p - A Point coordinater location of the Room in roomList to set.
        key - A boolean representing the state of the hasKey Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        door - A boolean representing the state of the hasDoor Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        map - A boolean representing the state of the hasMap Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        monster - A boolean representing the state of the hasMonster Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        food - A boolean representing the state of the hasFood Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)

      • setRoomWalls

        public void setRoomWalls(int x,
                         int y,
                         boolean left,
                         boolean right,
                         boolean up,
                         boolean down)
        Mutator to set the room wall booleans leftWall,rightWall,topWall,bottomWall given an input coordinate pair (x,y) room location in roomList.
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate location of the Room in roomList to set.
        y - An integer y-coordinate location of the Room in roomList to set.
        left - A boolean representing the state of the hasLeftWall Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        right - A boolean representing the state of the hasRightWall Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        up - A boolean representing the state of the hasTopWall Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)
        down - A boolean representing the state of the hasBottomWall Room boolean for the room at location (x,y)

      • setRoomWalls

                         boolean left,
                         boolean right,

      • copyHero

        public void copyHero(Player h)
        Mutator to point the hero object in the maze to a copy of another input Player object. Used to copy over the previous player into the new level with the same player stats..
        Parameters:
        h - A Player object to copy.

        public void setPlayerLocation(int x,
                              int y)
        Mutator to set the Player object hero location given input integers x,y as a coordinate input pair. Used to reset player to a new starting location (maybe use to start in a random location in the maze each time).
        Parameters:
        x - An integer x-coordinate.
        y - An integer y-coordinate.

        y - An integer y-coordinate.

      • setMonsterLocation

        public void setMonsterLocation(Point p)

        Parameters:
        p - A Point location to set the Monster object location to.

      • resetPlayerItems

        public void resetPlayerItems()
        Mutator to reset the Player object hero item Booleans for Map and Key, at the start of a new level.

      • setDoorLocation

        y - An integer y-coordinate location to set the Door object location to.
